p: Cell lines (A549, HepG2, and THP-1) were obtained from the Cell Bank of Type Culture Collection of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai Institute of Cell Biology (Shanghai, China). Cells were grown in DMEM (Thermo, NH, USA) containing 10% FBS (Thermo, NH, USA). In addition, all cell media was supplemented with penicillin (100 U/ml) and streptomycin (100 U/ml) at 37Â°C in a 5% CO 2 incubator.
